product_name: Outdoor Knots - Waterproof Plastic Fan Pack
long_description: Learn the 17 best knots to cover every rope-tying situation. Publisher: John E. Sherry. Copyright 2010. Perfect for camping, home or car; fits in shirt pocket, pack or on a key chain. Includes bowline, bowline on a bight, buntline hitch, butterfly knot, clove hitch, constrictor knot, double fisherman's, figure eight, half hitch, mooring knot, prusik knot. Also includes rolling hitch, sheet bend, square knot, tautline hitch, trucker's knot and water knot. Not only shows the steps for each knot, but also provides tips as to their best use. Six plastic cards are riveted at the corner for easy fanning; weights less than an ounce.
short_description: Learn the 17 best knots to cover every rope-tying situation. Outdoor Knots features easy-to-read, step-by-step drawings on waterproof plastic cards.
